attributes.review: My dog cried when he saw the stinky wrinkle bag on the opening page of this app. Animal abuse. Also Donut Tramp is literally the equivalent to a vomit worthy pile of moldy fat lard that’s been baked in the sun and sprinkled with Cheeto dust.
attributes.title: Absolutely wretched, to say the least

attributes.review: This app glitches a lot is just horrible it says it doesn’t give fake news but it does it’s a scam people please don’t use it.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: Right away when I pressed on the app I saw a Cheeto with a fricking tupe on next I had the displeasure of seeing my phone starting to barf out of my charging plug.
attributes.title: Horrible experience

attributes.review: Worst app ever. It set my house on fire as well as my neighbors once I opened it. There are a Bunch if glitches and giving false news. Cheeto heads were everywhere and I couldn’t get rid of it. Worst app ever.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD this app and I repeat DO NOT!!! After I downloaded the app and went into it it downloaded a virus! SO TO save you from getting that please do not download and leave a 1 star review!! TikTok😉😼
attributes.title: This app is horrible!!!

attributes.review: This app is extremely inappropriate, the orange monkey on my screen constantly is absolutely outrageous anyone who uses the app is nothing more than a trump supporter 🤢. Please remove this app-gen Z
attributes.title: This app is so bad (genztktok)

attributes.review: This app is NOT suitable for anyone aged 1-92!! Do not download!! Upon opening the app my whole family made up of thirteen people and I ALL became physically ill!! We all started puking all over the brand new carpet. Thanks Trump app 2020 >:(
The app is bad. The ads were too much I even saw a twerking banana. My eyes were permanently damaged. I had to bleach my brain never never never download this app.
attributes.title: Horrible just dont

attributes.review: First when I open the app there is a cheeta 🥩🖐and this app is horrible in general I wish I never downloaded this app and I wish this app never existed I’m disgusted 🤮
attributes.title: Waste of everybody’s time

attributes.review: wow i truly have never seen an app as horrendous as this! it’s slow and this ra*ist man was the first thing i saw as i opened the app!!! i’ve truly never felt so appalled 🤢 will definitely be deleting off my phone!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
